ErrorCode.description: The telescope has already been started

ErrorCode.name: TelescopeAlreadyStopped
ErrorCode.description: The telescope has already been stopped or was never started

ErrorCode.name: TelescopeIsBusy
ErrorCode.description: The telescope is already busy with an observation

ErrorCode.name: ProjectInUnexpectedState
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The project is in an unexpected state
ErrorCode.description: The project is in an unexpected state. It was supposed to be in READY state

Member.name: state
Member.description: Actual state of the project to be observed
